contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Chapter 19 - How a Great Church Goes Bad

fields.notesFormatted:
1. A great start doesn't guarantee a great ending.

    Revelation 2:1-5

  2. Focus on the harvest and ignore the weeds.

    Acts 19:1-10

  3. From savior to Lord.

    Acts 19:18-20

  4. Early warning signs of losing love.

    1 Timothy 1:3-5, 15-16, 3:7

    Ephesians 4:31-32, 5:1-2

  5. If I love people... I'm patient, kind, humble.

    • Not angry, bitter, or resentful.

    • Especially to those I disagree with

    1 Corinthians 13:4-8
